title: US Stocks Eke Out Weekly Gain Despite Friday Tech, Metal Selloff
description: US equities slipped Friday as traders bet that President Donald Trump’s pick to replace Jerome Powell as chair of the Federal Reserve would bring a hawkish stance to the central bank.
content: US equities slipped Friday as traders bet that President Donald Trump’s pick to replace Jerome Powell as chair of the Federal Reserve would bring a hawkish stance to the central bank.
